title: Get inspired by Poppy motivational posters

replies.body: Gotta say, my personal Favourite is "Don't stop if your exhausted, stop when you are done" cause of the fact that it has meaning outside of league but I also enjoy the "Every great champion starts at level 1"
Seeing these inspirational posters has filled me with **DETERMINATION**
Knowing that you're a big frontline tank despite having a hitbox the same size as Teemo...it fills you with DETERMINATION.
It's a beautiful day outside, the minions are spawning, the dragon is roaring. On days like this, people like you should be...
Teemos like you*

Playing LoL all day?
{{champion:51}}
When will these be on the merch store because I really want that lv 1 one
save
some don't load
Your internet's just gotta ( KEEP FIGHTING )>{{champion:78}}

{{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} THE IDIOTIC SHIT RIOT DOES INSTEAD OF NERFING TEEMO, ILLAO, FIZZ, YASUO, MF, EKKO, JAX, DARIUS, GAREN, SKARNER, MORDEKAISER, FIORA, RIVEN, NEW POPPY, QUINN, KOG MAW, GRAVES, MASTER YI AND ANY OTHER BS CHAMP THEY MADE JUST FUCKING PISSES ME OFF!!!{{summoner:14}} {{summoner:14}} {{summoner:14}} {{summoner:14}} {{summoner:14}} {{summoner:14}} {{summoner:14}} {{summoner:14}} {{summoner:14}} {{summoner:14}}
Yes, the art team should drop what their doing, and focus on champion balance. This way we get no new content and only have poorly made balance decisions made by artists.
why not
I mean their designers should nerf the champs not the art peeps!
please. stop being salty, learn to counterl=play.

most players champion pool consists of the few
 champs they are good at it a few op ones that 90% get banned so counter pick is unlikely with 90% of the players that Ive experienced

Yea but i don't know much about league so i don't know what champs to buy and i'm not in the habit of randomly buying champs. Think of the aram players when u play these games, they don't have champs because they don't want to be stuck with nunu in aram...
play lots buy everyone $$IP$$
Logged in to downvote. If that many champions are op, then it's actually balanced. Get good or get out.
The Only Thing that is smashed is my life and dreams ;_; kek
Dude that is so funny XD
URF is all I need.
I like all of them but my favorite one is number 2 followed by number 4

I don't get inspired by league much these days.

Elitism in league looks so solid I don't know if I can ever break it, only be subjected to it (so much fun when a diamond joins you'r friends lobby, accidently gets made host and kicks you because of rank)

QQ
I'm digging the Lvl 1, one I would buy them all tbh I love poppy even before the update ;-;, now shes just better cx

Personally I reckon that they are all fantastic! (Love the picture!). But my top three are
1-Every great champion starts at level 1
2-Don't stop if you're exhausted, stop when your done (I really like the double meaning with this with {{summoner:3}}  and being tired.
3-If you can dream it, you can smash it
number 2 and 4 were pretty good
